artist: Artist: Attributed to Pier Francesco Mola
creditline: Funds from an anonymous endowment in honor of Bruce Dayton and the Putnam Dana McMillan Fund
description: brown wash image of bearded, robed monk at L, kneeling in a natural landscape, looking upward to R; tree at R with diagonal lines in sky above; on tan colored paper; in modest black wooden frame with D-ring at TC verso
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on laid paper
title: Saint Francis Praying in a Landscape
